resources.string: App created by Alan Munirji University of Pittsburgh, Computational and Systems Biology 5/29/2019 REC Lee Lab
Connect to the ESP32 using Bluetooth
Communication between the microfluidics device and the device you are using right now depends on Bluetooth Low Energy technology. Make sure you allow the app turn on Bluetooth if it is not yet on.
Bluetooth Low Energy is not supported by this device. The app will not work on this device.
Get started with the app by following these steps:

Then, tap on "Connect to ESP32" and connect to the micro-controller via Bluetooth. Experiment is sent over and then started via a Go button. Any pauses put in the experiment can be resumed from using the Go button. If reset is pressed, experiment will start from the beginning
First, use the upload experiment button to choose an experiment created via Google Sheets or Microsoft Excel. The filetypes supported are .csv, .xlsx, and .xls, currently.
